transcript:
Customer: Aapne jis vyakti ko call kiya hai, woh abhi dusre call par vyast hai. Kripya prat.
Hellow
Hellow
Executive: Yes. 
Executive: Yes, Sarvacharya Smart Industries Private Limited se baat kar rahe hain sir?
Customer: Haan haan. Ji ji.
Executive: Mr. Rajesh baat kar rahe hain aap?
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Rajesh ji, VK Agrawal baat kar raha hu, manager IndiaMART se baat kar raha hu sir mai.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji, ji bataiye.
Executive: Sir ji aapne IndiaMART mein call kiya tha sir aapne?
Customer: Haan, maine call kiya tha actually dashboard mein mere ko samajhna hai kuch toh isliye aapke executive ko maine bulaya tha. Toh aaj toh mai leave pe hu. Toh kal aap apne executive ko bhej sakte hain kya? Sir product add karna hai update. Haan ji?
Executive: Sir executive toh koi personally nahi aa payega. Hum woh log aapko jo bhi call karke aapko batayenge aap video meeting pe aap connect kar lijiyega ya phir hum aapko verbally aapko bata denge kaise aapko product add karne hai apne services ke andar sir.
Customer: Product vagera add nahi, promotion jo hota hai na IndiaMART pe jaise push to top karke ek option aata hai. Mai actually Trade India mein kaam kar chuka hu toh Trade India mein ek tools tha aapka APT karke tools tha toh usme kya hota hai na ki kisi product ka SP tag karoge toh woh direct Google pe woh keyword promote hota tha.
Executive: Google pe toh hum Google pe hum log koi promotion nahi karte hum log sir.
Customer: Nahi nahi Google pe nahi IndiaMART hi apne aap mein bahut bada portal hai mai jaanta hu. Toh IndiaMART se bhi ranking increase ho jaati hai. Individual jo buyleads aati hai na. Already. Correct baat hai.
Customer: Haan ji. Hain?
Customer: Haan haan boliye boliye kya keh rahe hain aap?
Customer: Haan toh mere ko woh cheez seekhna hai ki yeh manage kaise hota hai. Isliye maine bulaya tha. Kyunki 135 mein hi ABC tower mein hi hai na aapka office aur hamara bhi.
Executive: Hamara office toh yahi par hi hai 135 mein hamara office. Haan ji bilkul theek keh rahe ho.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji toh ABC tower mein hai toh hamara bhi office hai toh koi aa jaata hai na aapke jo existing EC team se toh woh bata deta mere ko. 15 se 20 minute time lagta hai mai ek baar dekh leta uske baad mai. Kaun se floor pe baithe hain aap?
Customer: Fifth floor, fifth floor.
Executive: Tower tower four tower four mein paanchve floor pe hai hamara office.
Customer: Achha tower four mein aapka.
Executive: Ji ji. Achha.
Executive: Okay. Waha pe kis naam se aapki company?
Customer: Hellow. Haan ji kis naam se company hai sir waha pe?
Executive: Sarvacharya Smart Industries se hi hai.
Executive: Achha okay okay. Aapko sunao. Okay aur yeh jo Hamirpur mein aapka office hai aapka.
Customer: Hamirpur? Achha nahi hum haan ji haan ji. Hame woh 135 area jo hai na woh Hamirpur hi kehlata hai.
Executive: Achha achha achha okay okay.
Customer: 135 jo area hai na ABC woh Hamirpur area mein hi aata hai.
Executive: Ji ji haa mai samajh gaya aapki baat. Sanu se baat hui thi.
Customer: Sunna sir aapki baat. Sanu ne bhi aapko meri baat call kiya hoga. Maine mere khayal se shanivar ko raise kiya tha request.
Executive: Shanivar ko hamara off tha sir haan ji.
Customer: Toh aapke executive se baat bhi hui thi maine request kiya tha ki agar koi EC team se aa sakta hai service team se toh woh mere ko bata denge ki dashboard manage kaise hota hai mai do teen cheeze dekhna chahta hu and woh agar aa jaate toh phir yeh mai apne level pe kar leta mere ko pata chal jaata. 10 se 15 minute ka time lagega. Ji bilkul woh aapko dashboard samjha denge kaise aapko product add karna hai kaise budget consume karni hai aapko aur kaise aapko reply karna hai dashboard ke through woh aapko guidance de denge aapko. Kisi particular product ko aap promote karna chahte ho toh push to top ka ek option aata hai.
Executive: Sir woh pehle bahut kareeban 8-10 saal pehle woh option hua karta tha. Filhal woh option nahi hai aisa kuch khas option push to top wala.
Customer: Achha pehle hota tha?
Executive: Woh bahut saal pehle ki aap baat kar rahe ho sir woh.
Customer: Haan actually mai Trade India mein uss samay kaam karta tha na toh aapke IndiaMART Mumbai branch mein tha mai. Toh IndiaMART mein training vagera se toh woh batate the.
Executive: Kaha pe IndiaMART mein?
Customer: Haan IndiaMART mein Nilesh Tadpe karke the aapke regional head Mumbai ke.
Executive: Achha Mumbai ke achha achha achha achha. Nilesh Tadpe hain ya abhi kar rahe hain exit ho gaye woh?
Executive: Kaun si branch branch please aap kaun si dekh rahe ho Andheri Andheri mein toh. Andheri Andheri hai na. Pura pura naam kya tha unka?
Customer: Nilesh Tadpe.
Executive: Nilesh?
Customer: Nilesh Tadpe, Nilesh Tadpe.
Executive: N I L E S H aage kya bataya aapne?
Customer: Tadpe T E R T E. T E R. T. Tadpe D A R P E.
Executive: D A R achha. Haan.
Executive: N I L E S H hai na?
Customer: Haan Nilesh, Nilesh Tadpe aise karke the woh.
Executive: Nahi abhi toh nahi hai is naam se koi bhi employee hamare portal pe hamare IndiaMART mein toh.
Customer: Achha Nilesh Tadpe nahi hai nahi hai nahi hai nahi hai.
Executive: Haan abhi toh nahi hai. Us samay woh aapke regional head hua karte the toh hum log milte the toh batate the woh ki haan yaha pe option hai Trade India mein SP tag ka option tha jisse ki direct Google pe aata tha agar aap date content vagera aap kar do toh direct Google pe. Dekhiye sir abhi toh yahi hai ki sir agar aap kisi particular ka product ka agar aap budget jyada consume kar rahe ho theek hai kisi particular location se kar rahe ho toh us product ka promotion better ho jaata hai.
Customer: Aapki jo buyleads aati hai na toh uss buyleads pe maine kaam kiya hai ek bhi mature nahi ho raha hai. Ek bhi mature nahi ho raha hai.
Executive: Toh abhi kaha pe issue aa raha hai jaise aapka yeh solar rooftop hai sir aapka theek hai. Haan haan. Toh log jo dealing karte hain all over India basis pe karte hain aap sir?
Customer: Bilkul bilkul.
Executive: Okay. Abhi mai dekh raha tha ki abhi 18 ghante pehle solar rooftop ki Jhansi se requirement abhi aayi hai aayi hai aayi hai. Phir aap iske liye deal karte hain lithium ion battery se bhi deal karte hain aap?
Customer: Haan haan. Hamara lekin jo basic jo main core product hai na solar rooftop hai woh rooftop solar hai.
Executive: Achha solar rooftop hai achha aur yeh nahi lithium ion battery nahi hai.
Customer: Yeh bhi hai lekin jo hamara core hai na. Achha woh solar ka hai. Solar system hi hai haan. Lithium battery hai hamara lekin ab aisa hai na ki ab thode thode wala volume wala product bech ke kya karoge ab solar wala hai ki ek baar mein woh 50 product bechoge utna margin nahi hoga yeh ek project bech doge utna margin ho jaata hai.
Customer: Yeh cheez hai.
Executive: Ji ji ji. Aur isme hai solar pump mein bhi aaya hua tha Lucknow se aapke paas requirement aaya tha solar pump ke andar. Haan haan haan. Phir kal ki date mein aapke paas solar aur. Pump mein bhi deal karte hain hum log. Hain?
Customer: Pump mein bhi deal karte hain. Toh aap pump mein bhi deal karte ho achha.
Customer: Aapko Monday de sakte hain kisi ko kyunki bagal mein hi office hai 10 se 15 minute ke liye aap 9:30 10 baje kareeb mein bhej dijiye mai office nahi rahunga.
Executive: Achha aaj available nahi hai aaj?
Customer: Nahi aaj mai leave pe hu thoda ghar pe guest aaye hue hain toh isliye mai nahi gaya.
Executive: Achha achha achha achha. Haan. Okay.
Executive: Aapka fourth floor aapne fourth tower number four mein bataya aapne?
Customer: Haan tower four mein 509 number paanchve floor pe hai hamara.
Executive: Achha 509 number mein. Haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Theek hai mai ek baar baat kar leta hu kal ke liye kitne baje ka samay de rahe hain aap? Aap mera WhatsApp kar dijiye na taki mai. Theek hai mai ek agar toh aap apna jo number hai WhatsApp kar dunga mere ko directly call kar lena theek hai. Theek hai mai aapko call kar. Theek hai theek hai aapne call na woh customer game mein call kar dena ek aapka concern bhi raise ho gaya tha sir is cheez ko leke sir. Theek hai.
Executive: WhatsApp pe ho aap sir?
Customer: Haan ji?
Executive: Isi number pe ho na WhatsApp pe aap sir? Haan haan haan isi number pe aap kar dijiye.
Executive: Toh mai abhi apne isi number se aapko na mai WhatsApp bhi kar raha hu mai aapko sir ek baar theek hai. Theek hai theek hai. Aur yeh jo aapka concern tha usko mai close kar deta hu ek baar theek hai. Theek hai theek hai please please. Done sir okay thank you. Thank you thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to understand dashboard management.

- Wants executive visit for dashboard explanation.

- Buyleads are not maturing.



Resolution:

- Executive explained product addition via video call.

- Explained product promotion through budget consumption.

- Executive will check for executive visit possibility.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will WhatsApp the customer.

- Customer will call in customer care.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- dashboard, buyleads, product promotion, executive visit
